Description.Text: Nestled between Music Row and the downtown honky tonks that line Broadway sits Thompson Nashville in The Gulch. One of the best walkable areas in the city, The Gulch is the destination for locals and travelers alike with restaurants, bars, breweries and nightlife. Whether you're looking to shop, enjoy a meal or a place to listen to the music that makes Nashville the Music City, Thompson Nashville is a great place to be.

Marsh House - Marsh House on property offers breakfast-lunch -dinner. The Killebrew - Coffee Shop serving Breakfast and Lunch. LA Jackson Rooftop Bar - Roof top bar serving small plates and drinks Dinner and Late Night.
